original: skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba'i rgyud ces bya //🔽de'i rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba'i rgyud ces bya // de'i rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
translated: will have as birthplace the land called Chaining of Joy.

original: dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni ri dvagas @200a *; ;'dzin //
analyzed: dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni ri dvagas @200a *; ;'dzin //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for one hundred yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Deer;

original: de yi yum ni pad ma dkar zhes bya //🔽mdzes ba zhes byad yi sras yin no //
analyzed: de yi yum ni pad ma dkar zhes bya // mdzes ba zhes byad yi sras yin no //
translated: his m other’s, White Lotus.

original: gzi brjid 'od 'phro zhes bya rim gro pa //
analyzed: gzi brjid 'od 'phro zhes bya rim gro pa //
translated: His son will be called Beautiful; his principal attendant will be known as Fine Mind.

original: mya ngan med pa'i ri bo shes rab can; ;dge ba'i dpal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: mya ngan med pa'i ri bo shes rab can; ;dge ba'i dpal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: The one of wisdom will be known as Mountain of No Sorrow; the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Glory of Virtue.

original: 'dus pa dang por nyan thos drug stong yod //
analyzed: 'dus pa dang por nyan thos drug stong yod //
translated: In the first of his assemblies will be six thousand Sravakas;

original: gnyis par ldan stong gsum par bzhi stong yod //
analyzed: gnyis par ldan stong gsum par bzhi stong yod //
translated: in the second, ten thousand; in the third, four thousand.

original: tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bdun cu gcig /
analyzed: tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bdun cu gcig /
translated: His life will span seventy-one thousand years,🔽and even after the nirvana of this one of boundless glory,

original: mya ngan 'das nas de yi dam chos dag /
analyzed: mya ngan 'das nas de yi dam chos dag /
translated: the holy Dharma will remain

original: lo grangs bye ba phyed dang gnyis su gnas //
analyzed: lo grangs bye ba phyed dang gnyis su gnas //
translated: for a further twenty-five million years.

original: rgyal ba de yi sku gdung rgyas 'gyur la //
analyzed: rgyal ba de yi sku gdung rgyas 'gyur la //
translated: The relics of this Jina will be extensive,

original: mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu bcu gnyis //
analyzed: mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu bcu gnyis //
translated: and there will be ninety-two hundred times ten million stupas.

original: mi yi bdag po dus mkhyen rgyal po yi //
analyzed: mi yi bdag po dus mkhyen rgyal po yi //
translated: The Protector of Mankind, the King who Knows the Time,

original: skye ba'i yul ni mthong na dga' zhes byas //🔽de bzhin gshegs rigs bram ze'i 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni mthong na dga' zhes byas // de bzhin gshegs rigs bram ze'i 'od kyi tshad //
translated: will have as birthplace the land called Joyful to Behold.

original: dpag tshad drug yod yab ni lha sbyin yin //
analyzed: dpag tshad drug yod yab ni lha sbyin yin //
translated: This Tathagata will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for six yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Gift of Gods;

original: de yi yum ni ma smad pa zhes bya //
analyzed: de yi yum ni ma smad pa zhes bya //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Faultless.

original: sras po sprin yin dpal ni rim gro ba //
analyzed: sras po sprin yin dpal ni rim gro ba //
translated: His son will be called Cloud; his principal attendant will be known as Glory.

original: 'bar ba zhes bya mkhas pa'i mchog ma ste //
analyzed: 'bar ba zhes bya mkhas pa'i mchog ma ste //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Blazing;🔽the one w ith m iraculous abilities will be known as Abiding in Virtue.

original: bsam gtan stobs shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //🔽'dus pa dang por dgra bcom zag zad pa //
analyzed: bsam gtan stobs shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can // 'dus pa dang por dgra bcom zag zad pa //
translated: The one of miraculous abilities will be known as Strength of Meditative Absorption.

original: nyon mongs med pa bye ba nyi shu gnyis //
analyzed: nyon mongs med pa bye ba nyi shu gnyis //
translated: In the first of his assemblies will be twenty-two times ten million Arhats whose defilements have ceased,🔽who are without afflictive emotion.

original: gnyis par nyi shu gsum yod gsum par yang //
analyzed: gnyis par nyi shu gsum yod gsum par yang //
translated: In the second will be twenty-three, and in the third,

original: gnyis yod mi rnams tshe tshad lo lnga brgya //
analyzed: gnyis yod mi rnams tshe tshad lo lnga brgya //
translated: two. The lifespan of humans will be five hundred years.

original: 'khor ba 'jig mdzad mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: 'khor ba 'jig mdzad mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
translated: After the nirvana of the one who has destroyed samsara,

original: dam chos lo grangs nyis stong bar du gnas //
analyzed: dam chos lo grangs nyis stong bar du gnas //
translated: the holy Dharma will remain for two thousand years.

original: de yi sku gdung ril gcig mchod rten gcig /
analyzed: de yi sku gdung ril gcig mchod rten gcig /
translated: His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa,

original: gser gyi srog shing dpag tshad gcig tu @200b 'phags //
analyzed: gser gyi srog shing dpag tshad gcig tu @200b 'phags //
translated: a golden spire rising one yojana high.

original: srid mtha' mdzad pa dpal gyi snying po yi //
analyzed: srid mtha' mdzad pa dpal gyi snying po yi //
translated: The One Who Has Gone to the End of Existence, Shribhadra,

original: skye ba'i yul ni skya bo dga' zhes bya //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni skya bo dga' zhes bya //
translated: will have as birthplace the land called Joyful Gray.

original: rigs ni bram ze yin te dpag tshad gcig /
analyzed: rigs ni bram ze yin te dpag tshad gcig /
translated: He will be of priestly descent, and will be one yojana in height.

original: de yi yab ni zla ba'i stobs zhes bya //
analyzed: de yi yab ni zla ba'i stobs zhes bya //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Strength of the Moon;

original: au be zhes bya yum yin zla ba'i sras //
analyzed: au be zhes bya yum yin zla ba'i sras //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Lady of the Moon.

original: brtson 'grus bde ba'i dbang po rim gro ba //
analyzed: brtson 'grus bde ba'i dbang po rim gro ba //
translated: His son will be called Strength of Effort; his principal attendant will be known as Lord of Bliss.

original: nor gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya zhes rab can //
analyzed: nor gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya zhes rab can //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Source of Wealth;

original: bsam gtan dbang phyug zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can //🔽dgongs ba dri ma med pa'i dge slong dag /
analyzed: bsam gtan dbang phyug zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can // dgongs ba dri ma med pa'i dge slong dag /
translated: and the one of miraculous abilities will be known as Lord of Meditation.

original: 'dus pa dang por lnga khri bzhi stong yod //
analyzed: 'dus pa dang por lnga khri bzhi stong yod //
translated: The first of his assemblies will number forty-five thousand monks;

original: gnyis par drug khri gsum par brgyad khri yod //
analyzed: gnyis par drug khri gsum par brgyad khri yod //
translated: the second, sixty thousand; the third, eighty thousand.

original: sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag lnga bcu yin //
analyzed: sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag lnga bcu yin //
translated: His life will span fifty-five thousand years,

original: dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs 'bum du gnas //🔽rkang gnyis mchog ma de yi mchod rten yang //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs 'bum du gnas // rkang gnyis mchog ma de yi mchod rten yang //
translated: and the holy Dharma will remain a further one hundred thousand years.

original: gcig 'byung dpag tshad bzhi tsam khor yug tu //
analyzed: gcig 'byung dpag tshad bzhi tsam khor yug tu //
translated: There will be a single relic of this most excellent of humans, and a single stupa extending for four yojanas

original: gdugs bkab dril ba g-yer kha'i dra bas khyab //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' gzigs pa yi //
analyzed: gdugs bkab dril ba g-yer kha'i dra bas khyab // de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' gzigs pa yi //
translated: and covered with parasols, bells, and nets of small bells.

original: skye ba'i yul ni dga' bas mthong zhes bya //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od bzangs dpag tshad dag /
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni dga' bas mthong zhes bya // rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od bzangs dpag tshad dag /
translated: The Tathagata Bhavantagamin will have as birthplace the land called Joyful to Behold.

original: sum bcu gsum yod yab ni rnam par gnon //
analyzed: sum bcu gsum yod yab ni rnam par gnon //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for thirty-three yojanas. His father’s name will be Subduer;

original: de yi yum ni zla ba'i mdangs ldan ma; ;sras po rje btsan sbed pa rim gro pa //
analyzed: de yi yum ni zla ba'i mdangs ldan ma; ;sras po rje btsan sbed pa rim gro pa //
translated: his m other’s, Radiance of the Moon. His son will be called Lord; his principal attendant will be known as Hidden.

original: skye ba'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa'i mchog /
analyzed: skye ba'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa'i mchog /
translated: The one of skill will be known as Light of Birth;

original: drung ltar 'gro zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: drung ltar 'gro zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Going Like a Tree.

original: 'dus pa dang por dge slong brgyad khri yod //
analyzed: 'dus pa dang por dge slong brgyad khri yod //
translated: In the first of his assemblies will be eighty thousand monks;

original: gnyis par dgu khri gsum par byed pa yod //
analyzed: gnyis par dgu khri gsum par byed pa yod //
translated: in the second, ninety thousand; in the third, one hundred thousand.

original: sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag brgya yang yin //
analyzed: sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag brgya yang yin //
translated: His life will span one thousand times one hundred years,

original: mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos rnams kyang //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos rnams kyang //
translated: and even after his nirvana, the holy Dharma

original: lo grangs bye ba bar du gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: lo grangs bye ba bar du gnas par 'gyur //
translated: will remain for ten million years.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa @201a *//🔽the tsom mi mda' ba //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa @201a *// the tsom mi mda' ba //
translated: The Tathagata Asangakaukika

original: de yi sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas 'gyur la //
analyzed: de yi sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas 'gyur la //
translated: will have a single relic and one stupa extending for

original: mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu bcu gcig /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 'od dag gi /
analyzed: mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu bcu gcig / de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 'od dag gi /
translated: ninety-one yojanas and ornam ented with victory banners.

original: skye ba'i yul ni sman ces bya ba yin //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od gyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni sman ces bya ba yin // rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od gyi tshad //
translated: (11) The Tathagata Vidyutprabha will have as birthplace the land called Medicine.🔽He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for two yojanas.

original: dpag tshad gnyis yod bde ba'i dbang po yab //
analyzed: dpag tshad gnyis yod bde ba'i dbang po yab //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Lord of Bliss;

original: de'i yum ni yan lag dga' zhes bya //
analyzed: de'i yum ni yan lag dga' zhes bya //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Joyful Limbs.

original: sras po stobs bstan chos ni rim gro pa //
analyzed: sras po stobs bstan chos ni rim gro pa //
translated: His son will be called Strength Shown; his principal attendant will be known as Dharma.

original: nor lha zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: nor lha zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Wealth Deity;

original: snyan par sems shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //🔽de yi 'dus pa dang por dgra bcom pa //
analyzed: snyan par sems shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can // de yi 'dus pa dang por dgra bcom pa //
translated: the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Mind of Sweet Sounds.🔽In his first assembly will be eighty-two

original: nyon mongs zad pa brgyad bcu gnyis par yang //
analyzed: nyon mongs zad pa brgyad bcu gnyis par yang //
translated: Arhats who have exhausted the defilements;🔽in the second assembly, twice that number;

original: nyis gyur gsum pa dag tu sum gyur yod //
analyzed: nyis gyur gsum pa dag tu sum gyur yod //
translated: in the third, three times that number.

original: de yi sku tshe lo grangs nyis stong yin //
analyzed: de yi sku tshe lo grangs nyis stong yin //
translated: His life will span two thousand years,

original: rgyal ba de ni mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: rgyal ba de ni mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
translated: and even after the nirvana of this Jina,

original: dam chos lo grangs stong phrag bcur yang gnas //
analyzed: dam chos lo grangs stong phrag bcur yang gnas //
translated: the holy Dharma will remain for ten thousand years.

original: mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gcig 'byung la //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gcig 'byung la //
translated: There will be a single relic of this Jina, and a single stupa extending for six yojanas

original: gdugs grangs rgya phrag drug bcu gnyis kyis khyab //
analyzed: gdugs grangs rgya phrag drug bcu gnyis kyis khyab //
translated: and covered with a canopy of sixty thousand parasols.

original: 'jig rten mgon po gser gyi ri bo de'i //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po gser gyi ri bo de'i //
translated: The Protector of the World, Suvarṇaparvata,

original: skye ba'i yul ni dregs par byed ces bya //🔽rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni dregs par byed ces bya // rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //
translated: will have as birthplace the land called Arrogant.🔽This Jina will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for two yojanas.

original: dpag tshad gnyis yod yab ni gsal ba yin //🔽de yi yum ni dge mchog ma zhes bya //
analyzed: dpag tshad gnyis yod yab ni gsal ba yin // de yi yum ni dge mchog ma zhes bya //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Clarity;🔽his m other’s, Most Virtuous.

original: shin tu bkra shis sras mchog rim gro pa //
analyzed: shin tu bkra shis sras mchog rim gro pa //
translated: His son will be called Finest Auspiciousness; his principal attendant will be known as Excellent.

original: chos 'phags shes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: chos 'phags shes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste //
translated: Dharmodgata will be skilled in action.

original: mi yi tog ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //🔽'dus pa dang bor dgra bcom pa yi tshogs //
analyzed: mi yi tog ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can // 'dus pa dang bor dgra bcom pa yi tshogs //
translated: The one of miraculous abilities will be known as Ketu.🔽In the first of his assemblies will be a gathering of arhats

original: stong phrag sum bcu dag ni @201b 'byung par 'gyur //
analyzed: stong phrag sum bcu dag ni @201b 'byung par 'gyur //
translated: Numbering thirty thousand.

original: 'dus pa gnyis par nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod //
analyzed: 'dus pa gnyis par nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod //
translated: In the second assembly there will be twenty-eight thousand;

original: 'dus pa gsum par tshogs pa nyi shu yod //
analyzed: 'dus pa gsum par tshogs pa nyi shu yod //
translated: In the third assembly there will be twenty thousand.

original: de yi sku tshe lo grangs dgu stong yin //
analyzed: de yi sku tshe lo grangs dgu stong yin //
translated: His life will span nine thousand years,🔽And the Dharma of this one who has reached the culmination of existence

original: dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs stong phrag ni; ;sum bcu rtsa gnyis tham par gnas 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs stong phrag ni; ;sum bcu rtsa gnyis tham par gnas 'gyur zhing //
translated: Will remain for thirty-two thousand years.

original: de yi sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas par 'gyur //
translated: His relics will be extensive.

original: spyan dang ldan pa seng ges byin pa yi //
analyzed: spyan dang ldan pa seng ges byin pa yi //
translated: The one with eyes, Siṃhadāna,🔽will have as birthplace the land called Supreme Jewel.

original: skye ba'i yul ni rin chen mchog ces bya; ;mgon po'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni rin chen mchog ces bya; ;mgon po'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad //
translated: This protector will be of princely descent, and his light🔽will extend for sixty-five yojanas.

original: dpag tshad drug bcu rtsa lnga chos ldan yab //
analyzed: dpag tshad drug bcu rtsa lnga chos ldan yab //
translated: His father will be known as Dharma,

original: yum ni zla ldan sras ni rin po che //
analyzed: yum ni zla ldan sras ni rin po che //
translated: his mother will be known as Endowed with the Moon, and his son will be known as Jewel.

original: rim gro pa ni glog 'gyur zhes kyang bya //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni glog 'gyur zhes kyang bya //
translated: His principal attendant will be known as Lightning.

original: de tshe mkhas gyur dga' ba'i blo zhes bya //
analyzed: de tshe mkhas gyur dga' ba'i blo zhes bya //
translated: At that time, there will be a wise one called Joyful Mind.

original: dga' chen zhes bya de yi rdzu 'phrul can //🔽'dus pa dang por yang sring zad pa yi //
analyzed: dga' chen zhes bya de yi rdzu 'phrul can // 'dus pa dang por yang sring zad pa yi //
translated: The one with miraculous abilities will be called Great Joy.🔽In the first assembly will be a gathering of bhikṣus

original: dge slong tshogs pa 'bum phrag bzhi bcu yod //
analyzed: dge slong tshogs pa 'bum phrag bzhi bcu yod //
translated: Who have exhausted existence, forty thousand in number.

original: 'dus pa gnyis par 'bum phrag bzhi bcu gnyis //
analyzed: 'dus pa gnyis par 'bum phrag bzhi bcu gnyis //
translated: In the second assembly will be forty-two hundred thousand,

original: 'dus par sum par 'bum phrag bzhi bcu gsum //
analyzed: 'dus par sum par 'bum phrag bzhi bcu gsum //
translated: And in the third assembly, forty-three hundred thousand.

original: mi rnams tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bcu //
analyzed: mi rnams tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bcu //
translated: The lifespan of humans will be ten thousand years,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
translated: And after the nirvana of the Tathāgata

original: dam chos lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas //
analyzed: dam chos lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas //
translated: The holy Dharma will remain for eighty thousand years.

original: mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gcig tu zad //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gcig tu zad //
translated: There will be a single relic and a single stupa.

original: bde gshegs gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan gyi; ;skye ba'i yul ni me tog ldan zhes bya //🔽de'i rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: bde gshegs gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan gyi; ;skye ba'i yul ni me tog ldan zhes bya // de'i rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
translated: The Sugata Aparājitradhvaja will have as birthplace the land called Flowered.

original: dpag tshad gcig yod yab ni tshogs dbang po //
analyzed: dpag tshad gcig yod yab ni tshogs dbang po //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for one yojana. His father’s nam e will be Lord of the Assembly;

original: de'i yum lus mchog ces ni @202a *//🔽bya ba yin //
analyzed: de'i yum lus mchog ces ni @202a *//🔽bya ba yin //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Finest Body.🔽His son will be called Fine Mind; his principal attendant will be known as Fine Virtue.

original: yon tan stobs sras sgra can rim gro pa //🔽kha lo sgyur zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: yon tan stobs sras sgra can rim gro pa // kha lo sgyur zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste //
translated: His son will be called Strength of Virtue; his principal attendant will be known as Son of Strength.

original: sprin po che zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //🔽'dus pa dang por drang srong mchog dgra bcom //
analyzed: sprin po che zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can // 'dus pa dang por drang srong mchog dgra bcom //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Charioteer; the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Great Cloud.

original: tshogs pa bye ba brgya phrag gsum yang yod //
analyzed: tshogs pa bye ba brgya phrag gsum yang yod //
translated: In the first of his assemblies will be three hundred times ten million supreme sages, Arhats;

original: gnyis bar gnyis yod gsum par bye brgya gcig /
analyzed: gnyis bar gnyis yod gsum par bye brgya gcig /
translated: in the second, two; in the third, one hundred times ten million.

original: de tshe mi tshe grangs stong yin no; ;mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag /
analyzed: de tshe mi tshe grangs stong yin no; ;mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag /
translated: The human life span will be one thousand years, and after the nirvana of this Best of Men,

original: lo grangs sum stong bar du gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: lo grangs sum stong bar du gnas par 'gyur //
translated: the holy Dharma will remain a further three thousand years.

original: mya ngan 'das ba'i mchod rten bye ba ste //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das ba'i mchod rten bye ba ste //
translated: There will be ten million stupas of this nirvana,

original: sku gdung dam pa rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa mchog dga' grags pa yi //
analyzed: sku gdung dam pa rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur // de bzhin gshegs pa mchog dga' grags pa yi //
translated: and the relics will be extensive.

original: skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams ldan zhes bya //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams ldan zhes bya // rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
translated: The Tathagata Priyagamin will have as birthplace the land called Graced with Merit.

original: dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni 'gron bzangs yin //
analyzed: dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni 'gron bzangs yin //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for ten yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Good Merchant;

original: de yi yum ni sprin ldan ma zhes bya //
analyzed: de yi yum ni sprin ldan ma zhes bya //

original: ma gang zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: ma gang zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: The one of wisdom will be known as W orshiped by Gods; the one with m iraculous abilities will be known as M anner of Birth.

analyzed: dgra bcom bye ba brgya phrag gsum bcu gsum //
translated: He will hold thirty-three assemblies of Arhats, each num bering one h u n d red times ten million.

analyzed: gnyis par chags med sum bcu rtsa gnyis yod // gsum par zad med @210a *// sum bcu rtsa gcig yod //

analyzed: brgyad bcu rin chen bdun yin rgyas par 'gyur //

original: 'jig rten dag gi mgon po gtso bo yi //

analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams ldan zhes bya // rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad //

analyzed: dpag tshad gnyis yod yab ni zla bzangs yin //

analyzed: de'i yum ni me tog bsags shes bya //

analyzed: sras po mdzes pa dpal can rim gro ba // blo sbyangs zhes ni bya ba shes rab can //

analyzed: mtha' yas dpal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can // 'dus pa dang por dbang du gyur pa rnams //

original: stong phrag brgyad cu gnyis par dgu bcu yod //🔽gsum par dri ma med pa bye ba brgya //
analyzed: stong phrag brgyad cu gnyis par dgu bcu yod // gsum par dri ma med pa bye ba brgya //

analyzed: sku tshe lo grangs bye ba gnyis kyang yin //

original: dam chos lo grangs bye ba bcur yang gnas //
analyzed: dam chos lo grangs bye ba bcur yang gnas //
translated: and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further ten million years.

original: rgyang grags sum bcu pa yi mchod rten gcig /

translated: There will be a single stupa extending for thirty krosha s and

analyzed: rin chen bdun po dag gis de rgyas shing //

original: gdugs grangs bye ba brgya phrag bdun bcu gnyis //

analyzed: bde gshegs de'i rigs bram ze 'od kyi tshad // rgyang grangs bcu yod bshes gnyen bzang po @210b yab; ;skye bo'i mchod rten zhes bya ba skyed pa'i yum //

analyzed: sras po mchog ma mig bzangs rim gro ba //

translated: The hum an life span will be twenty-four thousand years,

analyzed: rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag / lo grangs bye bar gnas shing sku gdung 'phel //

analyzed: mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu yod de //

original: sras po nad med tog ni rim gro ba //

analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams dpal zhes bya // bde gshegs rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //

analyzed: rgyang grags gsum yod gzi brjid bzang po yab //

original: sras po blta sdug zhi ba rim gro ba //
analyzed: sras po blta sdug zhi ba rim gro ba //

original: chos 'phags zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: chos 'phags zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste //

analyzed: ma lus bcom pa stong phrag brgyad cu yod //
translated: In the first of his assemblies will be eighty thousand who have com pletely destroyed the dust of desire.

analyzed: 'dus pa gnyis par bdun cu rtsa brgyad yod //

analyzed: gsum par gti mug spangs pa bdun cu drug / de tsho mi rnams dag gi tshe yi tshad //

original: lo grangs stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa bzhi yin //
analyzed: lo grangs stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa bzhi yin //

original: gnyis gyur dag tu de'i dam chos gnas //
analyzed: gnyis gyur dag tu de'i dam chos gnas //

analyzed: dpag tshad bdun bcu yab ni yul 'khor bzang; ;shin tu dga' zhes bya ba yum yin no //

analyzed: sras po 'phan byed lhun por ma gro ba //

original: rgyu'i stobs shes bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: rgyu'i stobs shes bya ba mkhas pa ste //

original: gsum par bye ba stong phrag bdun cu yod //

translated: There will be ninety-four thousand times ten million🔽stupas of this Jina, each stupa ornam ented with canopies of gold.

original: skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten lta zhes bya //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten lta zhes bya // rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
translated: The Tathagata Samyaksambuddhi will have as birthplace the land called Seeing the World.

original: dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni lag bzangs yin //
analyzed: dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni lag bzangs yin //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for three yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Fine Hands;

original: sengge'i blo gros yum yin sras pa ni //
analyzed: sengge'i blo gros yum yin sras pa ni //
translated: the m other of the Jina will be known as Lionlike Intellect.

original: yon tan 'od yin mya ngan rim gro pa //🔽mya ngan sel zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: yon tan 'od yin mya ngan rim gro pa // mya ngan sel zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste //
translated: His son will be called Light of Virtue; his principal attendant will be known as Sorrow.

original: grags chen zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //🔽dgra bcom bye ba bdun cu rtsa bzhi ste //
analyzed: grags chen zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can // dgra bcom bye ba bdun cu rtsa bzhi ste //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Sorrow Removed; the one w ith m iraculous abilities will be known as Great Glory.

original: 'dus pa gnyis par bdun cu rtsa lnga yod /
analyzed: 'dus pa gnyis par bdun cu rtsa lnga yod /
translated: In the first of his assemblies will be seventy-four times ten million Arhats; in the second assembly will be seventy-five.

original: 'dus pa gsum par bdun bcu rtsa yang drug /
analyzed: 'dus pa gsum par bdun bcu rtsa yang drug /
translated: He will hold three assemblies, each num bering seventy-six times ten million.

original: sku tshe lo grangs bye ba bdun cu yin //
analyzed: sku tshe lo grangs bye ba bdun cu yin //
translated: His life will span seventy million years,

original: rdul dang bral bzad mthar mdzad pa yi //
analyzed: rdul dang bral bzad mthar mdzad pa yi //
translated: and even after the nirvana of this one who is free from defilement,

original: dam chos lo grangs bye ba phrag dgur gnas //
analyzed: dam chos lo grangs bye ba phrag dgur gnas //
translated: the holy Dharma will remain a further ninety million years.

original: mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag gsum yod de //
analyzed: mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag gsum yod de //
translated: There will be three h u n d red times ten million stupas,

original: gser gyis brgyan cing rin po che yis sbras //🔽bde bar gshegs pa yon tan 'od gsal gyi //
analyzed: gser gyis brgyan cing rin po che yis sbras // bde bar gshegs pa yon tan 'od gsal gyi //

original: skye ba'i yul ni byang chub mthong zhes bya //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni byang chub mthong zhes bya //
translated: The Sugata Gunaprabhasa will have as birthplace the land called Seeing Enlightenment.

original: rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for ten million yojanas.

original: kun du bye ba yab ni dgra thul yin //
analyzed: kun du bye ba yab ni dgra thul yin //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Subduer of Enemies;

original: brtul zhugs drag ldan zhes bya yum yin no //
analyzed: brtul zhugs drag ldan zhes bya yum yin no //

original: sras po bde dga' dga' bo rim gro pa //
analyzed: sras po bde dga' dga' bo rim gro pa //
translated: His son will be called Joyful Happiness; his principal attendant will be known as Joy.

original: lta sems zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: lta sems zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Mind of Vision;

original: 'od po che zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: 'od po che zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Great Light.

original: dgra bcom bye ba brgya phrag gcig tshang ste; ;gnyis par dgu bcu rtsa gsum par yang //
analyzed: dgra bcom bye ba brgya phrag gcig tshang ste; ;gnyis par dgu bcu rtsa gsum par yang //
translated: His first assembly will num ber one h u n d red times ten million Arhats; the second, ninety; the third, eighty.

analyzed: nor bu rin chen mchog ma dag gis sras // de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal dag gi /

analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams tshogs shes bya // rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad //
translated: The Tathagata Candranana will have as birthplace the land called Accumulation of Merit.🔽He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for thirty million yojanas.

original: bye ba gsum yod yab ni rgya mtsho yin //
analyzed: bye ba gsum yod yab ni rgya mtsho yin //

original: sras po tshogs dga' ni khum rim gro ba //
analyzed: sras po tshogs dga' ni khum rim gro ba //

original: sengges bltas zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: sengges bltas zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste //

analyzed: shin tu dga' shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //

analyzed: mi de dag gi tshe yi tshad dag ni //
translated: The human life span will be

analyzed: mchod rten bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu dgu //

analyzed: rin chen dag gis rnam par spras par 'gyur // de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od ske ba'i yul ni gtsug na rin po che zhes bya'o; ;rigs ni rgyal rigs so //

original: 'od ni dpag tshad brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad brgyad cu'o //
translated: The Tathagata Ratnaprabha will have as birthplace the land called Crown of Jewels. He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for eighty yojanas.

original: yab ni skal ldan 'dod ces bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni skal ldan 'dod ces bya'o //

analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni blo'i sgron ma zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rim gro ba ni yon tan lhag ces bya'o //

original: yab ni dbyig mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni dbyig mchog ces bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Finest Wealth;

original: yum ni blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni bzang sbyin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o // sras ni bzang sbyin zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Fine God; his m other’s nam e will be Good Mind.

original: ri ma gro pa ni dpag med 'gro zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni zla gdugs shes bya'o //
analyzed: ri ma gro pa ni dpag med 'gro zhes bya'o // shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni zla gdugs shes bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Good Gift; his principal attendant will be called Boundless Going.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mtshungs med ces bya'o //🔽'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos tshogs pa dung phyur phrag brgyad do //🔽gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag brgyad dang bye ba phrag lnga'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mtshungs med ces bya'o // 'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos tshogs pa dung phyur phrag brgyad do // gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag brgyad dang bye ba phrag lnga'o //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Moon Parasol; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Unequaled.

original: gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu'o //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs drug khri 'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu'o // sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs drug khri 'o //
translated: In his first assembly will be 800 million disciples; in the second assembly will be 850 million; in the third assembly will be 900 million.

original: dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga khri'i bar du gnas so //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga khri'i bar du gnas so //
translated: His life will span sixty thousand years, and the holy Dharma will remain a further fifty thousand years.

original: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: His relics will be extensive.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i sku skye ba'i yul ni nyams dga' ba sdug pa zhes bya'o //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i sku skye ba'i yul ni nyams dga' ba sdug pa zhes bya'o // rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
translated: The Tathagata Simhagati will have as birthplace the land called Delightful Beauty.

original: 'od ni gling ba zhi ba tsa ma mo //
analyzed: 'od ni gling ba zhi ba tsa ma mo //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend throughout the four continents.

original: yab ni lha'i med tog ces bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni lha'i med tog ces bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Flower of Gods;

original: yum ni mtshungs med mnyam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni mtshungs med mnyam zhes bya'o //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Incomparable Equality.

original: sras ni blo ldan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sras ni blo ldan zhes bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Wise One;

original: rim gro pa ni blo rdzogs shes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni blo rdzogs shes bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be called Fulfilled Mind.

original: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bsam @225b pa'i stobs shes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bsam @225b pa'i stobs shes bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Strength of Thought;

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam par 'byed pa'i ste zhes bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan bco brgyad de /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam par 'byed pa'i ste zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan bco brgyad de /
translated: the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Distin­ guishing the Path.

original: thams cad la'ang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo; ;sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad la'ang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo; ;sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o //
translated: He will hold eighteen assemblies, each num bering one billion. His life will span ten million years,

original: dam pa'i chos kyang la bye ba'i bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang la bye ba'i bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /
translated: and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further ten million years.

original: mchod rten yang gcig brad do //
analyzed: mchod rten yang gcig brad do //
translated: His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i blo skye ba'i yul ni mchog bsu shes bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i blo skye ba'i yul ni mchog bsu shes bya'o //
translated: (10) The Tathagata Vidumati will have as birthplace the land called Finest Approach.

original: rigs ni bram ze'o //
analyzed: rigs ni bram ze'o //
translated: He will be of priestly descent,

original: 'od ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o //🔽yab ni blo mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o // yab ni blo mchog ces bya'o //
translated: and his light will extend for five h u n d red yojanas.🔽His father’s nam e will be Finest Mind;

original: yum ni tshangs mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni tshangs mchog ces bya'o //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Finest Virtue.

original: sras ni brtul zhugs grub ces bya'o //
analyzed: sras ni brtul zhugs grub ces bya'o //
translated: His son will be known as Accomplishment of Spiritual Conduct;

original: rim gro ba ni nor lha zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro ba ni nor lha zhes bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as God of Wealth.

original: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten dga' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten dga' zhes bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Joy of the World;

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal brtan po zhes bya'o //

original: 'dus pa ni lan bcu ste /
analyzed: 'dus pa ni lan bcu ste /

analyzed: thams cad la'ang bye ba stong phrag bcu bcu 'o //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dga' skye ba'i yul ni 'od ldan zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rigs ni rgyal rigs so //

analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo dung phyur phrag gcig dang bye ba phrag brgyad kyi bar du gnas so //
